subject: Speed Skating
lead_paragraph: Apolo Anton Ohno and Katherine Reutter each won the 1,000- and 1,500-meter events and were the men’s and women’s points leaders after three days of the four-day United States short-track speedskating championships in Marquette, Mich.
snippet: Apolo Anton Ohno and Katherine Reutter each won the 1,000- and 1,500-meter events and were the men’s and women’s points leaders after three days of the four-day United States short-track speedskating championships in Marquette, Mich.
